More Snow?

Posted on Monday, April 16, 2007

So much for the Last Hurrah... Charlie, Nucci, and I went to Special-K on Thursday morning to take advantage of the fresh conditions. We found this fun little rope jump, photo creds to Nucci.

I can ollie pretty well...

... but Charlie does it like a pro with a stylish shifty.
